title: Natural Language Processing
description: Advanced language understanding to interpret and respond to human text with contextual awareness.

title: Computer Vision
description: Systems that can identify objects, people, writing, and actions in images and videos.

title: Generative Models
description: Create new content like images, music, and text based on training data patterns.

title: Reinforcement Learning
description: AI agents that learn to make decisions by receiving rewards for desired outcomes.
